questions.question: What is the purpose of the __init__ method in Python?

choices.choice: To destroy an object
To create an object
To initialize an object
To delete an object

questions.question: What is the difference between the . and __ methods in Python?

choices.choice: They are used to call the same method
They are used to call different methods
They are used to call a method that is not the same
They are used to call a method that is different

questions.question: What is the purpose of the __str__ method in Python?

choices.choice: To convert a string to an integer
To convert an integer to a string
To convert a string to a string
To return a string representation of an object

questions.question: What is the purpose of the __repr__ method in Python?

choices.choice: To return a string representation of an object
To return a hexadecimal representation of an object
To return a string representation of a list
To return a hexadecimal representation of a list

questions.question: What is the purpose of the __class__ method in Python?

choices.choice: To return the class of an object
To return the class of a function
To return the class of a list
To return the class of a dictionary
